title: Conestoga Wagon Bells
medium: watercolor, gouache and graphite on paperboard
dimensions:
overall: 30.8 x 40.8 cm (12 1/8 x 16 1/16 in.)
Original IAD Object: frame overall: 20" high; 21" wide; large bells: 3 1/4" high; 3 1/2" wide; small bells: 2 1/2" high; 2 1/2" wide; top section: 4 1/2" high; 14 1/2" wide; lower section: 5 1/2" high; 21" wide
